description: Arrange numbers in a clockwise spiral with initial terms a(1)=1, a(2)=2, a(4)=4, a(6)=6, a(8)=8, a(11)=3, a(15)=5, a(19)=7, a(23)=9; thereafter each number is relatively prime to all of its four (N,S,E,W) neighbors, but shares a factor with each of its (N,S,E,W) neighbors at distance 2 and also satisfies an additional condition stated in the comments.
